definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to like/to take pleasure in/keen on/fond of/interest/hobby/appetite for/CL:個|个[ge4]
to show concern and care for
to fall in love with/to be in love with
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect

sentences.english: Non-codependent love requires wholeness to emerge within.
sentences.chinese: 不再相互依賴的愛，需要從內在出現完整。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林後二8所以我勸你們，要向他證實你們的愛。

sentences.english: LECTURER: Hello my name is Paulo D'Iorio.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我是保羅D愛奧利歐。

sentences.english: I love it most , making me calm and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 此生最愛的東西，我愛她到狂熱，她卻令我心靜。

sentences.english: Loves had arrived place, was keeping yesterday's fragrance according to the past.
sentences.chinese: 愛曾經來到過的地方，依昔留着昨天的芬芳。

sentences.english: But Love does not traffic in a marketplace, nor use a huckster's scales.
sentences.chinese: 但愛不在市場上交易，也不用小販的秤來稱量。

sentences.english: I love this early morning, I love this Prague only scarcely dotted with visitors. On the Charles Bridges, pigeons are the only visitors looking for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我愛這清晨，這遊人尚還稀少的布拉格。

sentences.english: Accepted and run, let love stand the fleeting time.
sentences.chinese: 接納與磨合，讓愛經得起流年。

sentences.english: If love told me walked to down I'll spell to love go end.
sentences.chinese: 如果愛告訴我走下去我會拼到愛盡頭。

sentences.english: If love told me walked to down I'll spell to love go end.
sentences.chinese: 如果愛告訴我走下去我會拼到愛盡頭。

sentences.english: I love the horses more than I love anything else.
sentences.chinese: 我愛馬比我更愛其他任何東西。

sentences.english: The bay-crown's shade, Beloved, I surmise.
sentences.chinese: 愛，我猜度月桂冠的濃蔭。

sentences.english: Love them enough to allow them to experience the consequences of their actions.
sentences.chinese: 愛他們足以讓他們感受到自己的行爲產生的後果。

sentences.english: But Lista always thought that abbreviated for "Love".
sentences.chinese: 但她認爲那是“愛”的縮寫。

sentences.english: I am a talented worrier, too.
sentences.chinese: 但我也是個才氣橫溢的愛發愁的人。

definition: to fall in love with/to be in love with
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
